tweet: 1,064,243 jobs are in the balance as long as there is no action taken on #USMCA. House Republicans are ready to vote on the deal, but today, House Democrats are too busy playing politics to give those Americans peace of mind.
In an #Agriculture Committee mark up of a bipartisan draft of a bill to reauthorize the Commodity Futures Trading Commission #CFTC – at House Agriculture Committee

On Floor to recognize October as German American Heritage Month.  I am proud to serve with my colleague @USRepKeating as co-chairs of the Congressional German-American Caucus.  Together we introduced HR 446 to recognize the importance of the alliance between our two Countries

#USMCA is good for American workers, businesses, and farmers. It would lead to stronger growth, more exports, rising wages, and more American #jobs. Why is @SpeakerPelosi keeping these things from happening? #USMCAnow

On Floor to draw attention to an invasive pest that has potential to do more than $18 billion in agriculture damage in #Pennsylvania alone.  The #SpottedLanternfly is a native #Asian insect found in at least #PA 24 counties and multiple states feeding on fruit trees & #hardwoods. – at Floor of The House of Representatives

I join all of my colleagues in mourning the loss of Rep. Elijah Cummings who passed away this morning. He passionately served his beloved city of Baltimore & its constituents for over two decades in Congress. My thoughts & prayers are with Rep. Cummings' family & friends today.
